details.title: Comments on "Receiver antenna scan rate requirements needed to implement pulse chasing in a bistatic radar receiver"
details.abstract: For original paper see D.S.Purdy, ibid., vol.37, no.1, pp.285-7 (2001). It is shown that by selecting a different time variable, the approximations the author claims to be in error are indeed accurate. A reply by D.S.Purdy to these comments is included.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
